mchorse.mappet.api.scripts.user.entities

Interface IScriptNpc

  • All Superinterfaces:
    IScriptEntity

    public interface IScriptNpc
extends IScriptEntity
    Mappet's NPC entity interface. 
    
    function main(c)
    {
        if (c.getSubject().isNpc())
        {
            // Do something with the NPC...
        }
    }

    • Method Detail

      • getMappetNpc

        EntityNpc getMappetNpc()
        Get Mappet entity NPC instance. BEWARE: you need to know the MCP mappings in order to directly call methods on this instance!

        But some methods might have human readable method names. Please check EntityNpc class for methods that don't have Override annotation!

      • getNpcId

        java.lang.String getNpcId()
        Get NPC's NPC ID. 
        
    var pos = c.getSubject().getPosition();
    var npc = c.getWorld().spawnNpc("test", pos.x, pos.y + 2, pos.z);

    // This will output "true" as long as you have an NPC configured
    // in Mappet's NPC dashboard panel
    c.send(npc.getNpcId() === "test");

      • getSteeringOffsets

        java.util.List<ScriptVector> getSteeringOffsets()
        Gets the steering offset of the NPC. 
        
 c.getSubject().getSteeringOffsets().forEach((offset) -> {
     c.send(offset.x + ", " + offset.y + ", " + offset.z);
 });

        Returns:
        the attack range of the NPC.

      • setKillable

        void setKillable(boolean killable)
        Sets the killable status of the NPC. If false, then NPCs can be killed only by a command. Regardless of the state, killable allows to make this NPC damaged until 0 health. 
        
 c.getSubject().setKillable(true);
        Parameters:
        killable - the new killable status for the NPC.

      • isKillable

        boolean isKillable()
        Gets the killable status of the NPC. If false, then NPCs can be killed only by a command. Regardless of the state, killable allows to make this NPC damaged until 0 health. 
        
 var isKillable = c.getSubject().isKillable();
        Returns:
        true if the NPC is killable, false otherwise.

      • removePatrolPoint

        void removePatrolPoint(int x,
                       int y,
                       int z)
        Removes a patrol point at a certain position from the NPC. 
        
 var npc = c.getSubject();
 var pos = npc.getPosition();
 npc.removePatrolPoint(pos.x, pos.y, pos.z);
        Parameters:
        x - x coordinate
        y - y coordinate
        z - z coordinate
